data.text: @Ammarosa18 I appreciate the time you've taken to share your feedback with us. We are always looking for ways to enhance our customer experience and we can only do that with your help. Please be assured that your comments have been forwarded to our Marketing department for internal review.

data.text: @Gopal80820691 For complaint, compensation, or hotel and car rental reimbursement, you may send it through this link and expect a response from us within 24hrs. -Echo https://t.co/6p7yVNtzqx

@Gopal80820691 Thank you for sharing your experience. We're committed to providing our guests a better travel experience and we are sorry if we did not provide the level of service necessary to fulfill that commitment. -Echo

@Hardik_bharucha We truly apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you, Hardik_bharucha . Let us look into this further. Can you please DM us the 6-digit confirmation code and the full name of the passengers on the booking? We look forward to hearing from you. -Kris
@trvlbugAC Good afternoon. Thanks for reaching out and I do apologize for the delayed response. Can you send us a DM with your 6-digit confirmation code? -Bryan.

@gapteach We truly apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you, gapteach. Let us look into this further for you. Can you please DM us the 6-digit confirmation code and the full name of the passengers on the booking? We look forward to hearing from you. -Kris

@Ahendricksonn Hello Ahendrickson, I'm sorry to hear about your experience, please provide us your 6-digit confirmation code and full names of the passengers on the booking so we can look into this for you. -Echo

@Alif94130536 Thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. Can you pm me your six digit confirmation code along with the full names of the passenger listed and I can go over the options with you.-Brittany
@timrich58535263 We are trying to reply to you via direct message. Please follow us on Twitter so that our direct messages can reach you.

data.text: @esbee23 Hi Stephanie, thanks for reaching out! We completely apologize for the inconvenience you had. No worries, we are here to help. Can you please DM us the 6-digit confirmation code and the full name of the passengers so we can check for you? -Kris

@Babatoks @FemiOlawole Hi Akintokunbo, thanks for reaching out! We truly apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. Can you please DM us the 6-digit confirmation code and the full name of the passenger so that we can further look into this? We look forward to hearing from you. -Kris
@timrich58535263 Good afternoon  @timrich58535263. It´s not necessary we would get in touch with you in a couple minutes.- Rebeca
@KinahanRobert We are trying to reply to you via direct message. Please follow us on Twitter so that our direct messages can reach you.

data.text: @gilberts004 Hey, Joel. Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. We apologize for the delayed response due to the high chat volume. It is never our intention to keep anyone waiting for assistance. Have you successfully boarded the flight? Your patience is highly appreciated. -Echo

@DJAdded Hello @DJAdded, thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with us, we will be more than happy to assist with this concern. Kindly DM us your six-digit confirmation code and the full name of the passenger(s). -Onell

@bweikert1985 Hi there, thanks for reaching out! I apologize for the inconvenience and the time waiting. For a better assistance, may I have your 6-digit confirmation code along the full name of the passenger?
-Edgar

@ColinGacek @FrontierCare Please reach us out through DM so we can have your reservation details and check your booking status.
-Edgar

@ColinGacek Hi Colin, thanks for reaching out! I'm sorry to hear about your last travel experience, could you please reach us through DM sending out your 6-digit confirmation code along the full name of the passenger for a better assistance?
-Edgar

data.text:
Hey, #Denver! WIN Flights on America's Greenest Airline in honor of Earth Week!

Come to our (FREE) event at @impropercity for a chance to win free flights on 4/19 from 6 pm  - 9 pm.

RSVP now: https://t.co/5P9TTw0RQv

@visitdenver @DenverWestword  @denverpost @DENAirport https://t.co/cps1achneF

Frontier is as green as ....

- Taking 192,457 🚗 off the road
- Planting 🌲 - 1 million acres of them
- Saving 15.2 billion plastic 💧 bottles
- ♻️ 39,500,000 trash bags
- 359 billion straws disappearing 🥤
- Saving 102 million gallons of fuel ⛽

https://t.co/2Yk5j0Deug https://t.co/6IevyMoX3j

data.text: Puerto Rico's beloved Coqui Llanero won our Tropical Tails contest and our hearts! Check out this close-up look into the life of one of the smallest tree frogs in the world, who welcomed the @discover_PR team into its home.❤️🇵🇷 https://t.co/P1xGf9KBeD #CoquíFliesFrontier

data.text:
Go behind the scenes with the @prattandwhitney GTF engine - today's most fuel-efficient, lowest carbon-emitting engine for A320neo family aircraft. ✈💚 https://t.co/2aU4Mr2TD6

#FrontierAirines #FlyFrontier #WeArePW #sustainability #AmericasGreenestAirline https://t.co/3v5R9ALZkG

#HappyInternationalBeaverDay! 

❓ Did you know that Beavers are good house guests? Their lodges typically contain 2 dens, 1 for drying off after entering the lodge underwater, & a 2nd, dryer den where the family will live and socialize.

📸: Thom Patterson https://t.co/qpFcV3D4I3

Meet Eric Odell, the inspiration for one of our newer @Airbus plane tails - Odell the Lynx.

Eric, a Species Conservation Program Manager for @COParksWildlife, has greatly helped in the reintroduction of the species into their natural habitat. https://t.co/92WBOFmN9X

data.text: 🚨 "Hold on to your butts!" Following our endangered species tails, we are bringing attn to animals who were once endangered...& are now extinct. Today only, submit your best real dinosaur photo for a chance to be featured on a Frontier plane! https://t.co/NaROmPvYLS https://t.co/wgPA7yMhKh

🚨 We've got some exciting news coming your way tomorrow!

📍 Tune in here tomorrow at 9:00 am MT/11:00 am ET to get the scoop! https://t.co/lf8Gw0yA9z

Welcome, Rocky the Saw-Whet Owl. 🦉 He is named after the tiny owl found in the @rockcenternyc 🎄 tree in 2020. Rocky — short for Rockefeller — was rescued & taken to the @Ravensbeardorg, for rehabilitation and released back into the wild. https://t.co/cKDA8MRM6r. https://t.co/OWPnxTQp0Q

data.text:
We love our interns! Last week we hosted a lunch and learn for all of our current interns to get to know them better and provide an overview of the ins and outs of the aviation industry.

Interested in a paid summer internship with Frontier? Apply here: https://t.co/2ZVDMcmMIz https://t.co/wB0bKCw9ex

urls.title: Careers
urls.description: Our team members are the key to our success for providing low fares nationwide. Join our team and be a part of a rewarding and fast-paced industry.

data.text:
This week, we announced a major expansion of service, adding 27 nonstop routes, including new destinations Guadalajara & Monterrey, Mexico. In addition, we are also significantly growing our service from @PHLAirport & @RDUAirport! https://t.co/yhmHg4J4IL

*T's & c's apply. https://t.co/rUOejJJyG2

While others promise green solutions in the distant future, Frontier is 43% more fuel-efficient TODAY*! Polar bears can't wait for 2050, and you shouldn't either. Fly greener today for a green tomorrow. Learn more here: https://t.co/yc2EXELQt3 https://t.co/UUpvx2Qg4P

data.text: @ATLairport @DENAirport @PHLAirport @LASairport @RDUAirport @DFWAirport @SWFairport https://t.co/G8e7y9aEB6
@DENAirport @ATLairport @PHLAirport @LASairport @RDUAirport @DFWAirport @SWFairport Book your low fare today at https://t.co/WbmwDLdwNT!

It's officially going to be a hot *plane* summer with 30 new routes and fares from $29!*

For more information on our new service, visit: https://t.co/pgqgCTI4ZY

@DENAirport @ATLairport @PHLAirport @LASairport @RDUAirport @DFWAirport @SWFairport 

*Terms and conditions apply. https://t.co/aA4vdtI1Qf

Happy #InternationalWomensDay! This year’s theme is #BreaktheBias. Frontier team members and our business partners submitted these awesome photos showing their support in promoting a gender-equal world - free of bias, stereotypes, and discrimination. 💚✈ https://t.co/L6EB5sscGY

data.text: Ready to start your next adventure? Get ready to pack your bags and join the Frontier family as a Flight Attendant! We are one of the fastest-growing airlines (with the newest fleet) and are hiring 1,000+ Flight Attendants! Apply Today! https://t.co/qpXCHSNRq2 https://t.co/2xwIZTHFnp

urls.title: Flight Attendant
urls.description: Ready to start your next adventure? Begin your career as a flight attendant with Frontier Airlines.

data.text: We'd like to spotlight an internal initiative here at Frontier, available to Frontier employees & our business partners, the Women’s Leadership Network. The group is an inclusive, intersectional community that welcomes women from all identities and walks of life. #WomensHistory https://t.co/wtWb6GHnwE

data.text:
With a few weeks left in winter, and spring break rapidly approaching, now is the perfect time for a trip to the Caribbean! Frontier offers daily flights to @discover_PR, @VisitTheBahamas, and @VisitJamaicaNow! Fares from $69*. https://t.co/rQoVYxFJMW

*Terms Apply. https://t.co/7RpdxE8KNK

data.text:
Today is #NationalEmployeeAppreciationDay! We want to thank our team Frontier and airport partners for their efforts each and every day!

*Masks were taken off for photos and immediately put back on after per guidelines and regulations. https://t.co/gDeK4MVAhf

Happy #WorldWildlifeDay! At Frontier, our animal tails are a huge part of our brand and story. Today, we are proud to feature some of our animal friends of all shapes and sizes! https://t.co/bV6ySjZDCZ https://t.co/zpUWXKTAdT

urls.title: Plane Tails
urls.description: Discover all of our plane tails!

data.text: The @freddieawards are back for 2022! Frontier is nominated for multiple categories, and we would love your support. Vote today! https://t.co/AttioJQKlP https://t.co/VNW7gktgfb

We are excited to share that we are officially announcing plans to open a new crew base at @PHXSkyHarbor in Nov. 2022. Up to 180 pilots and 275 flight attendants are expected to be based at PHX within the 1st year.  https://t.co/LjgJgqqDYl

 📷: (@phoenix.spotting) https://t.co/IU6693lk9K

It's #InternationalPolarBearDay, and we are celebrating by highlighting one of our favorite resident bears, Blanco! 

Polar bears are one of the most endangered species. We're committed to telling the stories of threatened species via our plane tails. https://t.co/nDkRH4ekf0 https://t.co/eKPcWCURTd

Pack your bags and head to the majestic Rocky Mountains with us. Known for its breathtaking scenery, @Colorado has plenty to offer in outdoor winter activities.

Just a short drive from @visitdenver and @VisitCOS, venture with us to the high country!  https://t.co/Fz91w6aJlu https://t.co/nhZDRy2Qkh

data.text: We can’t wait to fly with our incoming GTF engines from leading engine manufacturer @prattandwhitney. We are already 43% more fuel-efficient than our competitors. The GTF engines will allow us to be an additional 16% more fuel-efficient. https://t.co/PJyTR6E8Jj https://t.co/qCB8vbdbeX
